dct_title_s: North America upon the globular projection, drawn from the latest and best authorities
dct_description_sm: Map was likely extracted from: Volume II of A new and comprehensive system of philology; or, a treatise of the literary arts and sciences, according to their present state / by Benjamin Martin, published in 1764, originally published in monthly installments as: The general magazine of arts and sciences, philosophical, philological, mathematical and mechanical.
dct_publisher_sm: printed and sold by W. Owen, and by Benjamin Martin
